The goal of this page is to list packages that are helpful for R development, excluding statistical subjects, which are covered elsewhere, and focusing on software engineering subjects. The packages are grouped by related activity. The tables are by no means exhaustive, first because this is work in progress, second because the goal is to list only *high quality packages*, where we'll try to better define *high quality* over time.  The page is partly generated by R code and uses information from the `DESCRIPTION` file in each package. This is to avoid duplicated, stale information and to give voice to the developers themselves.


```{r results='hide', message=FALSE, echo=FALSE}
library(devtools)

ip = install.packages

library(xtable)

make.table = 
  function(viewname, packages) {
    packages = sort(names(packages))
    table = 
      cbind(
        Title  = sapply(packages, function(x) packageDescription(x)$Title),
        Description = sapply(packages, function(x) packageDescription(x)$Description))
    row.names(table) = 
      sapply(
        packages, 
        function(x) {
          url = packageDescription(x)$URL
          if(is.null(url)) x
          else paste0("<a href=\"", url, "\">", x, "</a>")})
    print(
      xtable(
        label = "viewname",
        table),
      type = "html",
      sanitize.text.function = force)}
```

## Testing
```{r}
testing.packages = 
  list(
    testthat = ip("testthat"),
    quickcheck = install_github("RevolutionAnalytics/quickcheck/pkg"), 
    assertthat = ip("assertthat", type = "source"),
    covr = ip("covr"))
make.table("testing", testing.packages)
```

## Profiling
```{r}
profiling.packages = 
  list(
    microbenchmark = ip("microbenchmark"))
make.table("profiling", profiling.packages)
```


## Data structures
```{r}
data.structures.packages = 
  list(
    plyr = ip("plyr"),
    dplyr = ip("dplyr"), 
    data.table = ip("data.table"),
    bitops = ip("bitops"))
make.table("data.structures", data.structures.packages)
```

## Language processing or extension

```{r}
language.packages =
  list(
    compiler = ip("compiler"),
    pryr = ip("pryr"),
    lazyeval = ip("lazyeval"),
    magrittr = ip("magrittr"))
make.table("language", language.packages)
```
